mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (reviewno, content, rate, rdate, custno, restno) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{content}, #{rate}, sysdate, #{custno}, #{restno})
mapper.select: SELECT reviewno FROM ( SELECT reviewno FROM review WHERE restno = #{restno} AND custno = #{custno} ORDER BY reviewno DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT re.reviewno, re.content, re.rate, re.rdate, res.name AS restname, ri1.imagefile AS image1, ri2.imagefile AS image2, ri3.imagefile AS image3, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM review re LEFT JOIN restaurant res ON re.restno = res.restno LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri1 ON re.reviewno = ri1.reviewno AND ri1.rn = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri2 ON re.reviewno = ri2.reviewno AND ri2.rn = 2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri3 ON re.reviewno = ri3.reviewno AND ri3.rn = 3 ORDER BY re.rdate DESC ) WHERE rnum <= #{end_num} AND rnum >= #{start_num}

SELECT re.reviewno, rt.name as restname, cu.nickname, re.content, re.rate, re.rdate, re.custno, ri1.imagefile AS image1, ri2.imagefile AS image2, ri3.imagefile AS image3 FROM review re LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri1 ON re.reviewno = ri1.reviewno AND ri1.rn = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri2 ON re.reviewno = ri2.reviewno AND ri2.rn = 2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri3 ON re.reviewno = ri3.reviewno AND ri3.rn = 3 LEFT JOIN customer cu ON cu.custno = re.custno LEFT JOIN restaurant rt ON rt.restno = re.restno WHERE re.restno = #{restno} ORDER BY re.rdate DESC

SELECT re.reviewno, cu.nickname, re.content, re.rate, re.rdate, ri1.imagefile AS image1, ri2.imagefile AS image2, ri3.imagefile AS image3, rt.name AS restname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review_like rl WHERE rl.reviewno = re.reviewno) AS likes_count FROM review re LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri1 ON re.reviewno = ri1.reviewno AND ri1.rn = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri2 ON re.reviewno = ri2.reviewno AND ri2.rn = 2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reviewno, imagefile, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY reviewno ORDER BY review_imgno) AS rn FROM reviewimage ) ri3 ON re.reviewno = ri3.reviewno AND ri3.rn = 3 LEFT JOIN customer cu ON cu.custno = re.custno LEFT JOIN restaurant rt ON rt.restno = re.restno WHERE re.custno = #{custno} ORDER BY re.rdate DESC
